title: Old account But want to fix the capitalization
body: I made this account back in 2013 and back then i was naive enough to think i didn't care about caps but now im stuck staring at "datrout7" unless i want to pay the 1300 rp or the 13500 ip which is extremely steep if all im wanting to do is change it to "DaTrout7" is there some other kind of option such as selling part of my soul to rito for this simple caps fix?

replies.body: We might be able to work something out!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll look at your case individually to see what we can do.  :)
